conbody.p:
DITA Maps XSLT Parameter Sets are as follows:
Default View. Displays titles extracted from referenced topics and links to topics (unresolved topicrefs). Resolves conrefs. Default View XSLT parameter set of a Map.
Show Descriptions. Displays the shortdesc information of referenced topics. Show Descriptions XSLT parameter set of a Map.
Show Resolved. Resolves topicrefs showing the content of referenced topics.You can't edit the content of topics right in the map. Double-click a topic in the map to open it as a separate document. Show Resolved XSLT parameter set of a Map.
Edit Conrefs. Displays unresolved conrefs highlighted with blue and the path to the target element (the value of the conref attribute). Edit Conrefs XSLT parameter set of a Map.
